data.title: St. James Roman Catholic Church
data.meta_description: St. James Roman Catholic Church - Home page
data.text:
Join St. James for a Catholic men's spirituality group. It will cover a wide range of topics, including: Relationships · Faith · The Bible · Discipleship · Accountability · Leadership · Fatherhood * - Topic for this date. · Marriage · Real experiences of everyday life, such as aging or loss of a loved one

September 19, 2024 7:30 PM in Parish Center Room 103

Healing Mass

All Are Welcome

Come for Spiritual, Emotional and Physical Healing

Feeling....worried? tired? anxious? burned out? stressed out? facing a disease?

Jesus invites you to come and give your burdens to Him and experience the healing grace of God.

Every 3rd Wednesday of the month— 7pm

Prayer teams are available at the end of Mass for individual prayer and Father Robert will be available for an Anointing of the Sick for those facing surgery or serious illness.

Ministry to Families with Special Needs

Families who have members with special needs or developmental disabilities often find it difficult to attend weekly Mass together. We are pleased to provide an opportunity for families to experience and celebrate God’s presence in their lives at a special Mass.

This Mass is celebrated at 12:30 pm (please note new time) on the second Saturday of each month during the school year – January through May and September through December.

The next Mass will be celebrated on Saturday, September 14 at 12:30 pm

Please note: This Mass fulfills the Sunday Mass Obligation

The remaining 2024 Special Needs Masses will be celebrated on the following second Saturdays at 12:30 pm:

October 12 November 9 December 14

This ministry strives to be inclusive in its approach, inviting those with special needs to fill liturgical roles

such as proclaimer and musical accompaniment.

Please pick up a flyer about the Ministry to Families with Special Needs in the Church vestibule today and please help spread the word!

We are happy to tell you that through the kind generosity of St. James parishioner Jim Townsend and his partner Corey Arnold, of Bars and Tone Media Productions, we will continue to provide our weekend celebration of the Mass. Mass will be available on the website as well as the parish Facebook page and the Religious Education YouTube Channel through Thursday of the following week, and then available on the Weekly mass page. Our thanks also to the parishioners who responded to our call to be trained in providing this vital service to those unable to attend Mass in person, we are always looking for people wanting to learn the system and help out.

Weddings and Funerals are also able to be livestreamed should the family request it. Please see the front desk for more information.

The Catholic Faith Network (CFN), will continue to provide televised and online daily Masses. For your convenience, CFN also offers other devotional and spiritual programs. (Optimum channel 29/137; Verizon FiOS TV channel 296 and Spectrum channel 162/471)

We, the Catholic community of the Three Village area, formed as the Body of Christ through the waters of Baptism, are a pilgrim community journeying toward the fullness of the Kingdom of God, guided by the Holy Spirit, nourished by the Eucharist and formed by the Gospel.

We strive to respond to Jesus’ invitation: to be faithful and fruitful disciples; to be a Good Samaritan to (our) neighbor and enemy; stewards of and for God’s creation and living witnesses of Faith, Hope and Charity … so that in Jesus’ name, we may be a welcoming community, respectful of life in all its diversities.

The fruitful ministries at our parish are examples of how many of you have answered, and continue to answer, the call of discipleship. To ensure such work can continue requires not only gifts of time, but also of financial help. We ask you to prayerfully consider supporting our parish with electronic donations through Faith Direct.

You can sign up online at faith.direct/NY997 or call Faith Direct customer service at 866-507-8757.

You’ll provide us with consistent support that helps us always be at the ready with programs, services, and ministries for our church families and for those in need throughout the community.

Thank you for your continued support of our parish family.

Give securely either here online or by texting: 631.206.5614

Click on the following link to make your recurring gift through Faith Direct:

https://membership.faithdirect.net/enroll/NY997

Click below to make a one time gift through Faith Direct: https://membership.faithdirect.net/givenow/NY997
